attributes.action: make Britannia Day, a compulsory bank-holiday, the Monday after the Trooping the Colour celebration of HM official birthday in June.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia Day shall be a day to celebrate British Patriotism and our alliance to HM.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
